frame.name: Medium
frame.definition:
<def-root>Words in this frame describe a relationship in which an <fen>Item</fen> is expressed through a <fen>Text</fen>. <ex><fex name="Item">The act of murder is rampant</fex> <t>in</t> <fex name="Text">the Bible</fex>.</ex>
<ex><t>In</t> <fex name="Text">his State of the Union Address</fex>, <fex name="Item">President Bush committed our nation to achieving three great goals of our time</fex>.</ex>
<ex><fex name="Item">Linnaeus</fex> <t>in</t> <fex name="Text">his writings</fex> <fex name="Frequency">often</fex> <fex name="Item">quotes his great predecessor</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Text
FE.definition: <def-root>The written source, body of work, or linguistic utterance in which the <fen>Item</fen> is found/expressed. </def-root>

FE.name: Item
FE.definition: <def-root>The piece of information or expression that is contained within the <fen>Text</fen>. </def-root>

FE.name: Frequency
FE.definition:
<def-root>How often the <fen>Item</fen> appears in the <fen>Text</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Frequency">Everyday</fex> <t>in</t> <fex name="Text">the newspaper</fex> <fex name="Item">there are articles relating to science and technology</fex>.</ex></def-root>
